headline: Realty Income Announces 658th Consecutive Common Stock Monthly Dividend
summary: Realty Income Corporation (Realty Income, NYSE: O), The Monthly Dividend Company®, today announced that it has declared its 658th consecutive common stock monthly dividend. The dividend amount of $0.2685 per share, representing an annualized amount of $3.222 per share, is payable on May 15, 2025 to stockholders of record as of May 1, 2025.

headline: Stock Market Sell-Off: 2 No-Brainer Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: On April 2, the Trump administration roiled financial markets by introducing wide-ranging tariffs on most of America's trading partners.  Stocks are in a freefall, with the S&P 500 down around 15% year to date.  Let's explore why Realty Income (NYSE: O) and Dollar General (NYSE: DG) may have a place in your portfolio.

headline: 3 Monster Stocks to Hold for the Next 3 Years
summary: Three solid choices today are Realty Income (NYSE: O), Enterprise Products Partners (NYSE: EPD), and, for the more risk tolerant, British American Tobacco (NYSE: BTI).  Realty Income has a 5.8% dividend yield.  Adding Realty Income's monthly pay dividend to your portfolio will let you switch your focus from the negative mood of the market to the positive mood you'll get from collecting a regular dividend check.
